name: July
short_description: July is a PHP written open source ligthweight framework for easily creating web portals. Its has features such: built-in Smarty supp, module structure, user-admin(unix like), RSS supp, and easily creation of different kind of contents.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CMS Systems
